Reference

classes

persephone

persephone class

hierarchicalTimeSeries

Define a hierarchical time series

per_tramo()

tramoseats class

per_x13()

x13 class

plotting functions

plot(<hierarchicalTimeSeries>) plot(<persephoneSingle>)

Interactive time series plot for a persephone object

plotResiduals()

Several interactive plots in connection with residuals for a persephone object

plotSeasIrrCal()

Interactive plot of the seasonal component, irregular component and calendar effects for a persephone object

plotSiRatios()

Interactive plot of SI-ratios (and, in case of x11, of seasonal factors) by period

plotSpectrum()

Spectral Plots

other

generate_qr_table()

Generate figures from the EUROSTAT quality report

genTd()

Generation of trading day regressors

iterate()

Iterate over a hierarchical persephone object

is.persephone() as.persephone()

is.persephone

datasets

pi_caladj

Production in industry - Calendar adjusted, not seasonally adjusted

pi_sa

Production in industry - Seasonally and calendar adjusted

pi_unadj

Production in industry - Unadjusted data (i.e. neither seasonally adjusted nor calendar adjusted data)

weights_pi_ea19

Production Weightings: Countries' share as a % of EA-19 for Total Industry (except construction)

weights_pi_eu28

Production Weightings: Countries' share as a % of EU-28 for Total Industry (except construction)
